title: Personality Types and New Champs that you want to see in LOL [ COMMENT SUGGESTIONS ]
body:
Like the title, what do you want to see in league. And BTW, I'll just continue meddler's post in the dev corner, because its crowded now and it mixed with other disscussion.

~~~

So for me,

I hope to see

- A girl with a long hair hime cut who is always bored, has a bored expression even if she kills a person and very slothy. ( maybe a girl hairmancer, see link below to my thread about it).
- A Multi Personality Disorder champ that has a unique personality in each persona.
- A small(not actually small but petite woman) but terrible girl, has a kuudere personality(doesn't show emotions) especially when it comes to fighting, a psychopath maybe.
- A happy go lucky male( like lux) in the outside but sinister and evil in the inside. A good looking jerk fits this.
- A shy type character but after its levels it gains confidence
- A hag/mother figure/grandma champ. we need this riot! Don't let us down and try to hear suggestions from the community.
- A support that is some form of military commander who is essentially trying to grab the ADC by the scruff of their neck and shove them into the fray.( not my idea).

btw, we need a hairmancer( Like bayonetta, Flare Corona, etc. ) in leaugue. An example of a hairmancer is in my thread, i hope you could see this specially a rioter: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/X1PfGqc9-can-we-have-a-new-champ-that-uses-her-hair-as-skills?

Also, Comment what champ do you want to see in league too :D

EDIT: I'am so happy!! that my comment was noticed and hairmancers can be possible champ in league in the fututre :D

replies.body:
Riot! Please create a gay champ already!!!!!!!!!!!

Albeit for all we know his male x male love for Zed isn't sexual, he might just be so edgy that he wants to become the same mind as Zed and experience his own shadow or some shit

Though really sexuality has very little to do with personality or how they play in-game.  Tracer in OW worked well for about a year and everyone loved her and they just put it out there that she has a girlfriend at last years Xmas event.  Did that have a significant impact on her personality or gameplay?  Not even a small one, she's still bubbly, energenetic, fast, reckless Tracer.  We just know she likes to scissor cute girls now.
Riot just said that kayn has a crush on zed. Not implying that he is gay or something. Maybe that's just a man crush. crush has so many definitions too like idolism; idolizing zed
Um what? That was DanielZKlien just messing around.

Thanks god. 

_Btw, better don't mess around with answers like this. People take them serious._
yes! I agree

Yeah, dude, that's kind of not cool.

Riot is literally the only source for canonical league info when it comes to characters, relationships, etc. We kind of hang on every single word you say and if you say something about a character (unless you instantly add a disclaimer or joke), we take it seriously and consider it a part of the character regardless of who from Riot says it. Just try not to do that too much because we don't want to second guess if your "Amumu was a girl in life" comment was serious or a joke.

Point taken and that totally makes sense. Sorry for the confusion.

To be clear I wasn't implying what Kayns sexuality is or isn't. I was just pointing out that Daniel's comment was more for fun than canon.
It's fine, mistakes happen and I'm sure you guys will do your best to be more careful about what's a joke and what's canon in the future!
I wouldn't consider that as a mistake by Riot but more so a select group of people blowing stuff out of proportion on the internet as usual. To me it was pretty obvious the comment wasn't serious

Perhaps to you but like I said in the above post, people look to ALL of Riot when they want lore info. Unless you're specifically saying it's a joke (or it's so outlandish like Teemo's blowdart is a darkin), people will take it seriously.

Teemo's blowgun is a Darkin. Confirmed by a Yellow.

...What, exactly, _does_ a Yellow do, anyways?

Moderator for C&C/SA&S.

We handle reports and do cool stuff when we can. (Most of my work right now is a WIP though so ya'll gotta wait. )

To me it makes more sense to take as canon only what is written on official avenues like champ bios and events. I guess you could say Riot is making a mistake by not predicting does kind of comments make people go "wild", but really no one should take as canon what a Rioter writes on Reddit unless they specifically say it is cannon. That is a better approach to it I think, rather than Rioters having to constantly supervise what they say so as to not mislead people

This is true, but at the same time stories/bios/etc will never tell the whole story. There are numerous small aspects of characters that get lost because A.) They're not in the story or B.) they're too small to get a major point in the story.

Say, for example, a character like Ezreal has a tattoo. We're never going to know that unless someone comes out and says "Oh yeah Ezreal has tats" or they hamfist a story reason for Ezreal to go shirtless and show off the weird "E ♥ T" tattoo on his upper arm.

But the biggest issue was that this was a Rioter, the designer of the champion no less, saying a major fact when someone asked about Kayn's relationship with Zed. Regardless of how you feel, this was a major and important note about the character that you can't easily brush off as a joke unless you say so.

I mean this was the complete exchange:


kaynmain420 Does Kayn have/has he ever had a crush on Zed?

RiotPhoenix: **FANFIC TIIIIME ~**

DanielZKlein  Yes.

I really can't tell how from that you gather it is canon that Kayn is homosexual, but whatever


BTW, he also wrote this about Urgot:
"Urgot is housed in a maximum efficiency chemtech body. Nipples are superfluous and thus must be removed for maximum efficiency."

Guess that is canon now until clarified

....Uh. There's a huge variance in how those two questions are answered. They're not even remotely the same. 

Besides, "having a crush on someone" usually means you're attracted to them in some facet.
